text: Rayden Tallis (born 9 June 1975) is a former Australian rules footballer who played with Hawthorn in the AFL. Tallis made his Hawthorn debut in 1994 and earned a Rising Star nomination late in the season. He usually played in the back pocket but was also used through the midfield. Former Hawthorn star Dermott Brereton earned a lengthy suspension for standing on Rayden Tallis' head during a pre-season game in 1994. ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Hawthorn Football Club players Category:Eastern Ranges players
title: Rayden Tallis
